data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Stoke with the kick-off.
In the minute 39, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Lee Gregory.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has commenced. Preston with the kick-off.
In the minute 59, James McClean (Stoke) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Preston make their first substitution with Andrew Hughes replacing Jordan Storey.
Josh Tymon is on a sub for James McClean for Stoke.
In the minute 66, At Deepdale, Tommy Smith has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The home team replace Scott Sinclair with Brad Potts.
Jacob Brown is replacing Steven Fletcher for the away team.
In the minute 85, The away team replace Tashan Oakley-Boothe with Jordan Thompson.
Jacob Brown is booked for the away team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
Sean Maguire (Preston) gets a yellow card.
